title: TP (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK TP
Implements a pulse timer
(* Example declaration *)
TPInst
:
TP
;
(* Example in ST *)
TPInst
(
IN
:=
VarBOOL1
,
PT
:=
T#5s
);
VarBOOL2
:=
TPInst.Q
;

rows.Name: IN
rows.Comment: Rising edge starts the pulse timer and setsQtoTRUE

rows.Name: Q
rows.Comment: Pulse signal, set toTRUEforPTmilliseconds ifENhas a rising edge

rows:
Elapsed time since pulse timer started. It will then remain
constant afterPTis reached.
